name: Hentai Pick-pocket Adventure | 无尽扒手冒险
name_original: Hentai Pick-pocket Adventure | 无尽扒手冒险
description:
"Hentai Pick-pocket Adventure" is a short visual novel featuring a story of a young girl, Ary, who craves new experiences and adventures. Ary talks about why she stopped talking to her best friend, when she managed to know a famous person and how she found a love of her life.

Hentai Pick-pocket Adventure is a Visual Novel featuring:
  • short cool story about a girl with desires
  • a few rather developed characters
  • nice unstressing backgrounds
